work.name: Dropbox
work.summary: Developed Python and Go tools to redact personally identifiable information (PII) from debug data before transmitting it to third-party SaaS. Created an internal tool for seamless updates based on newly defined code errors. Increased by eight-fold the amount of debug data available to be observed, enhancing observability of debug data and increasing efficiency in issue detection and diagnosis for Dropbox developers.

work.name: Dropbox
work.summary: Integrated Dropbox Dash with Todoist Rest API using Javascript and Ruby on Rails. Dropbox Dash is a productivity app that aims to be a universal search bar. My work enables users to search for their tasks, sections, and labels in Todoist. Integrated Dropbox Dash with Discord API using Javascript and Ruby on Rails. My work enables users to search for the Discord servers their in, and the channels and members of said servers. Improved existing connections and tackled patterns and challenges in Command E’s existing framework.

projects.name: Spaced
projects.summary: Led the development of a mobile and web app for Spaced — a  project app to connect space owners and students needing storage in Grinnell, Iowa. Designed and implemented the entire backend for the app using Firebase for user authentication, database of profiles, users, spaces, and owners, and Stripe's API to handle payment. Integrated front-end and UI with backend through Firebase SDK and Stripe SDK in Flutter. Connected more than 40 students with members of the local community and alumni that provided summer storage.

projects.name: Evolution Simulation
projects.summary: Implemented genetic algorithm and neural network from scratch in Rust and used them to simulate the evolution of birds. Compile and run the simulation to the web browser through WebAssembly, using JavaScript and Canvas API to make frontend and live animate the simulation.

projects.name: Iterative Hard Thresholding and Normalized Iterative Hard Thresholding
projects.summary: Researched and implemented IHT and NIHT algorithms, proving NIHT conditions of convergence with asymmetric restricted isometry constants. Compared IHT, NIHT, and OMP in empirical tests.

projects.name: Currency Arbitrage Opportunity Finder
projects.summary: Implemented Bellman-Ford algorithm to find negative cost cycles in currency graphs. Used the negative cost cycles to find arbitrage opportunities in currency exchange.

projects.name: Parallel Black-Scholes
projects.summary: Implemented a parallel option pricing tool utilizing GPU acceleration, based on the European options solution of the Black-Scholes model. The program calculates call and put prices for provided options, generates an output file with the prices, and reports execution statistics to the terminal.

projects.name: Analysis of Duffing Oscillators
projects.summary: Analyzed non-linear damped, driven harmonic oscillators with Duffing Equation. Employed Euler’s method for numerical integration. Used MatPlotLib to generate graphs for the time series, phase spaces, and the Poincaré sections of the analyzed systems.
